display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets attack and movement speed are slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD
display_target_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets attack and movement speed are slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_target_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
